H2415.def: = limb ◄ springing from a tree or bough, ► which can be used to beat someone, ≈ but also symbolizes a new beginning

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H1503.def: = the main body of a tree, which is either the part that remains in the earth after the stem or trunk is cut off, or a branch that is planted with the intention that it develops new roots; ≈ symbol of something apparently dead that has the potential for renewed life

H3448.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Obed<SDBH:עֹובֵד>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► father of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H5342.def: = a young branch springing from the main stock of a tree or plant; ≈ often used in a figurative sense to denote human offspring

H8328.def: = a part of a plant normally below ground, which acts as a support and collects water and nourishment, ≈ associated with well-being, offspring, and the inclination of the mind

H6509.def: = process by which humans, animals, or plants produce much offspring, ► and so grow in number and strength

H7307.def: = an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H5117.def: = action by which humans or animals stop their current or regular activities, ► often with the purpose of recovering their strength

H2451.def: = state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency

H998.def: = state in which someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

H1369.def: = the ability to accomplish great things because of characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

H1847.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H3374.def: = state in which humans experience fear
= state in which humans experience fear

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H4758.def: = the part of an object that can be seen with the eye

H3198.def: = action by which someone with judicial authority settles a dispute between two parties

H241.def: = one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry

H6664.def: = state in which a weight or measure is correct or accurate, in accordance with a standard

H1800.def: = a hinged barrier at the entrance to a building or room; ≈ used metaphorically to denote a person's lips with special focus on the lip's ability to shut the mouth

H4334.def: = an area of fairly level, high ground; ≈ sometimes associated with a lack of obstacles, both literally and figuratively

H3198.def: = action by which someone with judicial authority settles a dispute between two parties

H6035.def: = state of persons who are suffering and unable to help themselves ◄ because of their own need or status, or the result of someone else's behavior ≈ often used positively of persons who are sincere and not arrogant in their behavior

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H7626.def: = stick ◄ usually made of wood; ► attribute of a shepherd or a ruler, but also used for other purposes, such as beating, walking, fighting, etc.; ≈ associated with shepherding, authority, punishment

H4191.def: = process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

H7563.def: = state in which a person's behavior is inconsistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior

H7307.def: = an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)

H6664.def: = state in which a weight or measure is correct or accurate, in accordance with a standard

H232.def: = piece of cloth ► wrapped around the waist to cover the private parts; commonly worn by slaves; ≈ associated with low status

H4975.def: = the two sides of the body of humans and certain animals between the rib cage and the hips, ► which is the place where people normally tie a girdle, breeches, loincloth, or sackcloth; ≈ a symbol of strength

H530.def: = state in which an object does not move

H2504.def: = area located on both sides of spine between false ribs and hip-bone; ◄ part of human body; ≈ often used to indicate the entire waist region of the body; euphemism for male genitals

H2061.def: = wild, four-footed, predatory canine; light-brown fur, similar to jackal, but much bigger; ◄ Canis lupus; ► commonly prey on flocks; ≈ regarded as ravenous and fierce; symbol of roaming, opportunistic, dangerous, fierce, and clever banditry

H1481.def: = state in which humans live in a place that is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time

H3532.def: = young of a sheep, either male or female; ► eaten at Passover, and used for sacrifice; its fleece is used for clothing

H5246.def: = one of the great cat family of about 2 m in length and of a yellowish brown color with black spots arranged in rosettes all over the body and the tail; ◄ Panthera pardus; ► hunts by stalking prey; ≈ symbol of violent danger

H7257.def: = action by which humans or animals assume a horizontal position, either to rest or to attack

H5695.def: = male young of a {L:cow<SDBH:פָּרָה>}; ► used as a symbol for a deity; also used as sacrifice; ≈ associated with being willful and untrained

H4806.def: = a young animal that has been fattened to prepare it for slaughter, either for food or sacrifice

H5288.def: = a young male, ranging from childhood to adulthood; ► often in the service of other people; ≈ typically regarded as healthy and physically strong, but also lacking the experience and wisdom of the {L:older men<SDBH:זָקֵן>}

H5090.def: = causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or animals to journey from one place to the other, whether with force or not

H7462.def: = action by which animals are feeding on grass and other edible materials in the field, ≈ often extended to denote the way a king cares for his subjects or the way God cares for his people

H1677.def: = large mammal with thick fur and a rather doglike face; walks on all fours but may stand up on its back legs to get a better view; maybe 2 meters tall when standing up and weigh over 200 kilos; feeds on roots, berries, wild fruit, mice, and lizards, and, occasionally, small livestock; ◄ |iUrsus arctos syriacus|i*; ► dangerous when provoked or robbed of cubs; ≈ associated with violence and danger

H3206.def: = posterity of humans and or animals of undetermined sex, at an age ranging from before birth to adulthood

H7257.def: = action by which humans or animals assume a horizontal position, either to rest or to attack

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H8401.def: = dried stalks of grain and grasses, usually left over from harvesting grain ► used as food for animals or as an ingredient for making clay bricks; ≈ associated with something of little value

H1241.def: = large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth

H3243.def: = action by which newborn children drink milk from their mother's breasts

H6620.def: = snake with the ability to spread the ribs in the neck area, so as to form a broad, flat profile called the hood, which makes it look thicker than it really is; reaches two meters in length and 50 millimeters in diameter; it is dark brown with a yellowish underside; very poisonous; feeds on mice, gerbils, birds, bird eggs, lizards, frogs, and other snakes; ≈ associated with great danger

H2352.def: = white cloth; ◄ woven out of either linen or cotton; ► used for making clothes or to decorate the house; ≈ regarded as valuable and therefore symbolizing high status

H1580.def: = causative process by which a mother causes her baby to become accustomed to food other than its mother's milk

H1911.def: = causative action by which humans place part of their body in a certain location

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H6848.def: = extremely poisonous snake with the ability to spread the ribs in the neck area so as to form a broad, flat profile; dark brown in color with a yellowish underside (and sometimes yellowish bands); ◄ Desert Cobra (|iWalterinnesia aegyptia|i*) or Egyptian Cobra (|iNaja haje|i*); ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression and lurking danger

H3975.def: = hole in the ground; ► place where an animal lives

H7489.def: literally: to make (one's deeds) wrong; hence: = action by which humans behave in an evil or harmful way

H7843.def: = process by which objects are affected by violence, destruction, putrefaction, pollution, blemishes, and other factors that may have a destructive impact

H6944.def: = state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H4390.def: = state or process in which a certain location, container, or surface is filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left

H1844.def: = state in which humans or deities are acquainted with facts, truths, or principles, as a result of experience, study or investigation

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3220.def: = a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

H3680.def: = state or process by which a surface is covered by another object, ► often making this surface more or less invisible

H4325.def: = water as the indispensible liquid on which the existence of all life depends, used for drinking, preparing food, washing, irrigating, etc.; found under the earth, on the earth, and above the earth; sometimes used as a euphemism to denote certain body liquids; ≈ associated with abundance and refreshment, but also with instability, and danger, etc.

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H8328.def: = a part of a plant normally below ground, which acts as a support and collects water and nourishment, ≈ associated with well-being, offspring, and the inclination of the mind

H3448.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Obed<SDBH:עֹובֵד>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► father of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H5975.def: = process by which humans, deities, animals, or inanimate objects take position in a certain location in an upright position

H5251.def: = a distinctive object in the form of a flag or board attached to a stick, or a metal device or image fitted on the end of a pole; ► normally used to identify a particular group, or as a rallying point for soldiers in war; ≈ often used figuratively to denote an example, or a person or deity that one can rely on, or something that shows the way

H1875.def: = action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another

H4496.def: literally: rest; hence: = a state of mind in which humans find relief after a time of distress

H3519.def: = position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority

H3254.def: = action by which humans or deities add to an existing number of entities

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H136.def: originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of {L:אָדֹון<SDBH:אָדֹון>}: = way of addressing God as master and lord

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H8145.def: = state in which a countable entity is the second in a range

H7069.def: = action by which humans acquire an animate or inanimate object ◄ by means of a financial transaction or in another way

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H4714.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}; ► regarded as founder of the {L:Egyptian<SDBH:מִצְרִי>} nation

H3568.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}; ► regarded as ancestor of the {L:Cushites<SDBH:כּוּשִׁי>}

H5867.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Shem<SDBH:שֵׁם>}; ► regarded as founder of a nation with the same name

H2574.def: = town, area; ◄ on Orontes river in {L:Syria<SDBH:אֲרָם>}; ► capital of {L:Aramean<SDBH:אֲרַמִּי>} kingdom; its inhabitants were relocated to {L:Samaria<SDBH:שֹׁמְרֹון>} by the king of {L:Assyria<SDBH:אַשּׁוּר>}

H339.def: = area located near the sea and/or the people living there; ≈ associated with commerce, remoteness, paganism, but also called on to acknowledge YHWH

H3220.def: = a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H5251.def: = a distinctive object in the form of a flag or board attached to a stick, or a metal device or image fitted on the end of a pole; ► normally used to identify a particular group, or as a rallying point for soldiers in war; ≈ often used figuratively to denote an example, or a person or deity that one can rely on, or something that shows the way

H622.def: = process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war

H5080.def: = state in which one's hand, which holds an instrument like an axe, is raised ► with the purpose of striking it against another object

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H6908.def: = action by which humans or animals come together as a group for a common purpose

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H702.def: = state in which a countable entity is four in number

H3671.def: = part of body; ◄ of bird, insect, celestial creature; ► used for flying but also to give protection

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H669.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of {L:Joseph<SDBH:יֹוסֵף>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H6430.def: = inhabitant of {L:Philistia<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}, considered to have come from {L:Kaphtor<SDBH:כַּפְתֹּור>}

H123.def: = man; usually referred to as {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}; brother of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>}; ► ancestor of the {L:Edomites<SDBH:אֲדֹומִי>}

H4124.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} and one of his daughters; ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name

H5983.def: = nation; ◄ situated E. of river {L:Jordan<SDBH:יַרְדֵּן>}; according to {S:00101903800100200} founded by {L:Ben-Ammi<SDBH:בֶּן־עַמִּי>}, son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>}

H7651.def: = state in which a countable entity is seven in number

H1869.def: = action by which humans or animals move forward by lifting and setting down each foot in turn

H5275.def: = a covering for the foot ◄ usually made of leather or wood ► either  open and laced around the foot or ankle with a strap, or closed around the foot like a shoe

H4546.def: = a relatively wide road or access ramp made by by covering the surface of the ground with thicks layers of sand
